vista.graph
Class GEBorderLayout

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GEBorderLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
GELayoutManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
GEMultiBorderLayout
public class GEBorderLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements GELayoutManager

Lays out the elements in North, South , East , West and Center positions. The elements are sized by their preferred sizes for the NSEW positions with the remaining space going to the Center position. This is useful for laying out the axis elements in a Plot

Version:
$Id: GEBorderLayout.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:56 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu (DWR).
See Also:
Plot

layoutContainer

public void layoutContainer(BoundedComposite target)
Lays out the specified BoundedComposite. This method will actually reshape the elements in the specified target BoundedComposite in order to satisfy the constraints of the GEBorderLayout object.

Specified by:
layoutContainer in interface GELayoutManager
Parameters:
target - the element being laid out
See Also:
BoundedComposite
